page.title: 03Places Of Interest 2
page.content: {St. Mary Magdalene Church}was thought to be built around 1100 A.D.The Church is very famous for it's many brasses, many people come to do brass rubbings. The stained glass windows are very attractive although only 100 years old.The table tomb at the top end of the Church has statues of Lord Cobham and his wife.Also smaller figures of his ten sons and four daughters are around the tomb.The Lord De Cobham family were responsible for building much of the church and doing many repairs.The font is placed in the center of the tower,the circular shaft is of late Norman times.The Church contains many pews for people to sit on during the church service.There are six bells,four of which go back to the 17th Century.
